name: Legend of Pounds Island
overview: A single player PD\Freeware adventure game from Asa Margetts and David Charman. The game begins in 1947; there was a kingdom far, far away, situated in a location only known to few. In the kingdom lay the king himself, he was old and dying, you are his son, at the tender age of 10, you look after his grey with brown patched dog. This dog meant more to the king then anyone could know. Jaharra, the meanest ,roughest guy in the land was at war with the King, but always got the worst when battling him. He needed to get at the king. 1950: after 3 years of planning, he fought and managed to kidnap the king's dog. He took him away and slaughtered the poor dog. You and the king were devastated. The King took ill from it and died. But you promised you would find the evil Jaharra and escort him to his grave.
